      • setPricing

        public void setPricing(java.lang.Character productCode,
              int productQuantity,
              float productPackPrice)
        Description copied from interface: POSTerminalAPI
        The required part of the API
        Set (write) product pricing
        Specified by:
        setPricing in interface POSTerminalAPI
        Parameters:
        productCode - product code. We have to use Character, as in the requirements.
        productQuantity - Quantity of products in one pack. May be 1. 0 - is up to upper system level.
        productPackPrice - Price for such product pack. 0 - is up to upper system level.

      • isReadyForGetTotal

        public boolean isReadyForGetTotal()
        Description copied from interface: POSTerminalAPI
        If the terminal not know about anything in the order, or
        if the terminal not know price for quantity=1 in the pack return false.
        Specified by:
        isReadyForGetTotal in interface POSTerminalAPI

      • getLastErrors

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getLastErrors()
        Description copied from interface: POSTerminalAPI
        Get last errors, if any.
        Specified by:
        getLastErrors in interface POSTerminalAPI
        Returns:
        ArrayList of errors descriptors (if any errors from scanning orders) or empty list (i.e. with 0 size).
        Achtung! Never returns null, if errors are absent - result will be just empty.

      • locateProductByCode

        public Product locateProductByCode(java.lang.Character codeToSearch)
        Locate Product among known
        Parameters:
        codeToSearch - Code product to search
        Returns:
        Product, where Product.productCode==codeToSearch , or null
